sentences: Awatef Abdel Karim (Arabic: عواطف عبدالكريم; February 8, 1931 - April 24, 2021) was an Egyptian composer of contemporary classical music.
In 1991, she succeeded Gamal Abdel-Rahim as chairman of the composition and conducting department of the Cairo Conservatoire, serving in that position until 1997.
A revised edition of her book, Music Appreciation of Nineteenth Century Music was published in 2005 in Cairo.
She was awarded the State Merit Award in June 2006.
